text: idk how you guys all had some bad experience and some said the staffs were rude but i was in this sch for 6 years and nvr have i seen any of the staffs being rude to the students nor the guests they always try their best to understand us and this sch doesn‚Äôt js care about ‚Äúgrades‚Äù maybe they will if u dont do well and not try ur best u can fail but if u don‚Äôt put in the effort ofc they will scold u right? and wdym you guys told the teachers abt ur kids getting bullied and they didn‚Äôt do anyt cause from my experience they did they wld talk to ur kids abt getting bullied who knows maybe is ur kid bully others one sia dont anyhow say if u dk anytüò≠üò≠
it is my favourite school. The teachers teach us very well and the lessons are very fun and engaging. All the teachers are kind, I would recommend joining this school.

All my 4 kids attended this school, I‚Äôm really sad that ever since principal changed everything had changed, Hong Wen used to be strong In Chinese culture but now all they care is academics. Few years ago I would proudly recommend Hong Wen school but now I will not.

A very bad school that only seems to care about grades.My daughter gets bullied and a regular class has 10 bullies! Though already reported to the school the form teachers did not even care at all! Only untill I reported to the teachers then they cared only a bit about my daughter. Highly discouraged to join as the school is like invested with bullies.

This school is RIDICULOUS my son Feng Xiaotong gets bullied EVERY SINGLE DAY. She comes home crying. Called the teachers many times but nothing was done. Reported. NEVER go to this school, infested with bullies. Do not recommend.
-Feng Wufeng, wife of Feng Xiaotong
